document_data.mainbody:
Argath was a member of the Cult of the Howling Hatred.
Argath was originally a scoundrel from a settlement near Silverymoon. After being banished from his home, he joined the Howling Hatred. In 1491 DR, he acted as the cults liaison and the supervisor of the bugbear chieftain Hrar, in Damara near the Monastery of the Yellow Rose. Eventually, an adventuring party hired for a mission at the monastery were convinced by sergeant Sergor to fight Hrar and his minions, and Argath also was killed.
